title: Amazon Essentials Men's Straight-Fit Stretch Jean
description: STRAIGHT FIT: Fitted through the hip and thigh with a straight leg. Sits at the waist.
LIGHT-STRETCH DENIM: Mid-weight cotton denim with a bit of stretch for all-day comfort. Comes in indigo denim washes or solid colors with a garment wash for a lived in denim-inspired look.
STRAIGHT JEAN: These classic, five-pocket jeans are a wardrobe workhorse, perfect for business casual or everyday on-the-go.

DETAILS: Features zippered fly with metal button fly closure, bartack reinforcements, and rivets at front hand pockets. With stretch denim, it is always recommended to hang to dry for an extended garment life.
An Amazon brand - These classic 5-pocket straight-fit jeans are crafted with a bit of stretch for additional comfort and to help maintain their shape
